title: Riot hasn't released any easy/simple champions in a while and its having a negative effect on balan
body:
In the past there were champions of all levels of skill and rather then balance around the whole community they balanced around skill levels meaning harder champs = lower WR. Zed for example being near 50% was considered overpowered because of the skill it took to use him. Now he is at 50% and its fine? Now instead of having all the easy champions at the top of the WR charts, we now have w/e is 50%+ WR and are hard champions to master instantly become hyper meta.

This problem them becomes twofold where there are people who are playing new champions when their skill level is not there yet simply because the easy ones are weak / there are a small pool of them.

To fix this Riot needs to go back to the frame of balancing and start creating more easy champions.
